channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large holes in the football pitch, 27th October
item.description:
Springfields football pitch ( the field at the car park end). One large hole and lots of deep cracks and holes over the field. Dangerous to walk over specially now with the darker evenings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Persimmon Gardens, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light 21 on new road, 27th October
item.description:
On the junction of Chapel Lane and new Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 27th October
item.description:
Vegetation overgrowing and reducing width of FW Please cut back to increase width of FW Stop and go with temp FW closure (Embankment & Cuttings)
Report on FixMyStreet
